0: For 38 years Pat Summitt was a winning coach with an impeccable reputation for doing things the right way. She won a ton of games and several National Championships. Along the way she had some great players and one particular look that at times took on a life of its own. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR "First time I got the stare, I showed up five minutes early for practice but I didn't know that meant I was late," former Lady Vol Vicki Baugh said.
